title: Trailblazer League/Guide/Ranged

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ranged as a combat skill is expected to be heavily influenced by Tier 3 and Tier 6 Relics.

content:
Trailblazer League
Guides

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Useful items and boosts
  • 3 Quests
    • 3.1 XP rewards with skill choice

Overview[edit | edit source]

Ranged as a combat skill is expected to be heavily influenced by Tier 3 and Tier 6 Relics.

The Rigour prayer is unavailable in Trailblazer League. The Eagle Eye prayer is the best available substitute.

Ranging potions are unavailable in the Kandarin and Fremennik regions.

Useful items and boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Misthalin Karamja Asgarnia Desert Fremennik Kandarin Morytania Tirannwn Wilderness Notes
Default BiS gear This is the best ranging gear available prior to unlocking other regions, not counting items obtained from clue scrolls. To craft your own dragonhide armour you must unlock either the Desert region, Kandarin region, Asgarnia region, Fremennik region, or the Morytania region to tan leather.
Black mask (i) +15% Ranged damage on Slayer tasks. Requires 58 Slayer to obtain a black mask from Cave horrors and costs 1.25m GP to imbue the black mask at the Nightmare Zone, which is otherwise disabled during Trailblazer League.
Black dragonhide armour Requires 70 Ranged and 70 Defence. Limited by access to tanned leather, any one of the regions listed provides access. Otherwise only obtainable from drops or clues.
Void knight equipment Requires 42 Ranged. To buy the items, a player must have 42 Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, and Magic, along with 22 Prayer.
Elite Void Knight equipment Requires 42 Ranged and the Hard Western Provinces Diary. Crystal bow task is auto-unlocked, so the 70 Ranged requirement should not exist.
Crystal equipment Requires 70 Ranged. Crystal armour requires completion of The Gauntlet.
Karil's equipment Requires 70 Ranged and 70 Defence to equip Karil the Tainted's equipment.
Armadyl equipment Requires 70 Ranged and 70 Defence to equip Armadyl armour. Players will only have ammunition up to rune bolts unless they unlock the Fremennik region.
Necklace of anguish Requires 75 Hitpoints, 93 Magic, and 92 Crafting. Obtained from killing demonic gorillas.
Dorgeshuun crossbow Requires 28 Ranged. Fires bone bolts. Requires the Lost Tribe quest.
Grey chinchompa Requires 45 Ranged and 53 Hunter. Eagles' Peak quest must be completed in Kandarin, unless the quest is auto-unlocked in Tirannwn or the Wilderness. Located in Piscatoris Hunter area.
Red chinchompa Requires 55 Ranged and 63 Hunter. Eagles' Peak quest must be completed in Kandarin, unless the quest is auto-unlocked in Tirannwn or the Wilderness. Located in Feldip Hunter area or Gwenith Hunter area.
Black chinchompa Requires 65 Ranged and 73 Hunter. Located south-east of the Lava maze.
Toxic blowpipe Requires 75 Ranged. Obtained from killing Zulrah. Ammunition will be difficult to obtain without completing Tourist Trap in the Desert Region to unlock the ability to smith Dart tips.
Dart tips Dart tips may be obtained from PvM activities or implings and fletched. However darts will be difficult to obtain without completing Tourist Trap in the Desert Region to unlock the ability to smith Dart tips.
Craw's bow Requires 60 Ranged. Charged with revenant ether.
Dragon crossbow Requires 64 Ranged. May be created with 78 Fletching. Players must kill adamant dragon or rune dragon to obtain dragon limbs, which requires the completion of Dragon Slayer II, which only auto-unlocks in the Fremennik region.
Dwarf multicannon Costs 750,000 to purchase. Requires completion of the Dwarf cannon quest, which has two region requirements.
Ranging potion May be obtained from drops or clue scrolls. Production is limited by access to wine of Zamorak. Requires either Morytania and completion of Theatre of Blood, Desert and killing the Kalphite Queen, Tirannwn and killing Greater Nechryael, or Wilderness or Asgarnia.
Ranging cape Requires 99 Ranged. Saves 72% of ammo used, may be upgraded to save 80% with a Vorkath's head.
Ava's accumulator Saves 72% of ammo used. Requires either only Fremennik or Morytania and Asgarnia to complete Animal Magnetism.
Ava's assembler Only obtainable by killing Vorkath in the Fremennik region.
